meanings.sent1: The old cat had a wrinkly face.
meanings.sent2: She ironed the wrinkly shirt to make it smooth.
meanings.sent3: The wrinkly paper made it hard to read the note.
meanings.sent4: His wrinkly hands told the story of hard work and age.
meanings.sent5: The wrinkly elephant skin felt rough to the touch.

meanings.definition: A wrinkle or crease in the skin or fabric
meanings.sent1: She smoothed out the wrinkly on the bedsheet.
meanings.sent2: The baby's giggles made little wrinkles on his face.
meanings.sent3: The cat played with the wrinkly in the blanket, making a fort.
meanings.sent4: The wrinkly in the map showed the path of the river.
meanings.sent5: The wrinkly in the carpet tripped up the unsuspecting guest.
